ygData.subject: MM Advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi folks, This weekend was good to me as I finally hit level 30. Then I ventured deep and fought in lower guk for the first time. Well, now I m looking forward
ygData.messageBody:
Hi folks,

This weekend was good to me as I finally hit level 30. Then I ventured deep
and fought in lower guk for the first time.

Well, now I'm looking forward once again and I've set my sights on a MM
Battle Drum, a lute of the Gypsy Princess and a Gypsy Lute. (So I can make
my lambent BP)

I was hoping that you all could share some of your tactics used when
fighting in the castle to prevent the famous MM trains as well as to give me
some idea of what level party (and which classes) would be necessary to
break and hold the ball room.

Draelon Stormsong
the Tribunal
